content.rendered:
Tharshiny is an educator and co-foundered Regent with her life and business partner. She also started to provide private tuition for the next £20 in Year 2000. She graduated from Brunel University as a computer science graduate and started to teach computer science at Stanmore College where she did her pre-university education.

She spent considerable amount of time during the 20 years of the growth of Regent, as a full time mother and as a Co-Principal of Regent Independent College, an independent school and Sixth form college. Regent College London, opened in 2010, initially delivering higher education courses and providing students from sixth form college, with alternative progression route into higher education.

She is now along with the brilliant Regent team, jointly spearheading Regent College London’s growth strategy into a New British University, and leading the Digital Learning, launched post Covid19 as Regent Digital along with responsibility for all corporate services of Regent College London. Regent Digital shall be the catalyst of Education after Covid19, that is Regent Blended Digital Academic Delivery.
